post.call_to_action: Tap to shop the new Diamond Bomb shade and tag us in your glowy selfies! #fentybeauty
post.image_prompt: A close-up shot of the Fenty Beauty Diamond Bomb All-Over Diamond Veil in "Cognac Candy." The product is housed in its signature geometric compact, which is partially open to reveal the shimmering, caramel-toned powder inside. The powder has a multi-dimensional, almost wet-looking sheen. The background is a soft, blurred gradient of warm browns and golds, mimicking the color of the highlighter. The lighting is soft and diffused, highlighting the reflective particles in the powder. The composition is clean and modern, with the focus entirely on the product. The overall mood is luxurious and glamorous. In the foreground, a makeup brush with soft, synthetic bristles is lightly touching the surface of the powder, suggesting application. The image should have a shallow depth of field, blurring the background and emphasizing the texture of the Diamond Bomb. The Fenty Beauty logo is subtly visible on the compact. The image should evoke a feeling of warmth, radiance, and effortless beauty.
